Articles.Content:
Communiction between KSC and vehicles seems unreliable.  

I was able to launch a rover to Mun successfully, but once deployed, it could not communicate with KSC and was unable to be controlled.  

I saved the game and reloaded and communication was restored.  I was unable to see in the tracking center which vehicles did and did not have communication to KSC.

Steam Build 10624168
Any vehicle uncoupled from a mothership will have no connection to KSP until you save and reload. This is pretty easily replicated.
